name: Space Merc
description:
Space Merc is a survival space shooter, inspired by Asteroids. The objective is to survive the longest time possible while defeating continuous waves of enemies. The game gets progressively harder.

First game I ever created.

Date: Oct 2015 to Jan 2016

Technology: Processing

Platforms: Windows

Controls:

[ARROW KEYS] to move

[Q] & [E] to rotate

[W] to shoot

[SPACE] to use shield

[P] to pause
